4.name: blindness
4.wearOffMessage: You feel a cloak of blindness dissolve.

36.name: sanctuary
36.wearOffMessage: The white aura around your body fades.

44.name: sense life
44.wearOffMessage: You feel less aware of your surroundings.

45.name: animate dead
45.wearOffMessage: Your undead creation crumbles to dust.

50.name: infravision
50.wearOffMessage: Your night vision seems to fade.

52.name: stone skin
52.wearOffMessage: &3&dYour skin softens and returns to normal.&0

55.name: wall of fog
55.wearOffMessage: The fog seems to clear out.

56.name: wall of stone
56.wearOffMessage: The wall of stone crumbles into dust.

57.name: fly
57.wearOffMessage: You feel the weight of your body return.

67.name: farsee
67.wearOffMessage: Your pupils dilate as your vision returns to normal.

92.name: soulshield
92.wearOffMessage: The aura guarding your body fades away.

103.name: feather fall
103.wearOffMessage: You float back to the ground.

105.name: fireshield
105.wearOffMessage: The flames around your body dissipate.

106.name: coldshield
106.wearOffMessage: The ice formation around your body melts.

107.name: minor globe
107.wearOffMessage: The globe around your body fades out.

108.name: major globe
108.wearOffMessage: The globe of force surrounding you dissipates.

110.name: harness
110.wearOffMessage: &4The harnessed power in your body fades.&0

115.name: circle of light
115.wearOffMessage: The circle of light above you fades out.

118.name: elemental warding
118.wearOffMessage: You feel less safe from the elements.

125.name: spinechiller
125.wearOffMessage: The tingling in your spine subsides.

126.name: wings of heaven
126.wearOffMessage: Your wings gently fold back and fade away.

131.name: dark presence
131.wearOffMessage: You feel the dark presence leave you.

132.name: demonskin
132.wearOffMessage: Your skin reverts back to normal.

135.name: disease
135.wearOffMessage: You are cured of your disease!

137.name: demonic aspect
137.wearOffMessage: The demon within you fades away.

140.name: demonic mutation
140.wearOffMessage: You mutate back to your original form.

141.name: wings of hell
141.wearOffMessage: Your giant bat-like wings fold up and vanish.

144.name: barkskin
144.wearOffMessage: Your skin softens back to its original texture.

150.name: natures embrace
150.wearOffMessage: Nature releases you from her embrace.

151.name: entangle
151.wearOffMessage: You break free of the vines.

153.name: wandering woods
153.wearOffMessage: The woods around you shift back to their proper form.

154.name: urban renewal
154.wearOffMessage: &2The woods in the surrounding area break apart and crumble.&0

159.name: smoke
159.wearOffMessage: As the smoke clears, your vision returns.

160.name: mirage
160.wearOffMessage: You become more visible as the heat around your body dies out.

169.name: negate heat
169.wearOffMessage: Your immunity to heat has passed.

172.name: ice armor
172.wearOffMessage: Your iced encasing melts away, leaving you vulnerable again.

176.name: wall of ice
176.wearOffMessage: The wall of ice melts away...

179.name: vaporform
179.wearOffMessage: Your form condenses into flesh once again.

180.name: negate cold
180.wearOffMessage: You feel vulnerable to the cold again.

181.name: waterform
181.wearOffMessage: Your form solidifies into flesh once again.

184.name: reduce
184.wearOffMessage: You return to your normal size.&0

185.name: enlarge
185.wearOffMessage: You return to your normal size.&0

190.name: glory
190.wearOffMessage: Your visage becomes plain once again.

191.name: illusory wall
191.wearOffMessage: The wall dissolves into tiny motes of light...

194.name: isolation
194.wearOffMessage: It is as if a veil has lifted from the surrounding area.

214.name: natures guidance
214.wearOffMessage: You suddenly feel a little unguided.

216.name: phantasm
216.wearOffMessage: Your illusion dissolves into tiny multicolored lights that float away.

217.name: simulacrum
217.wearOffMessage: Your illusion dissolves into tiny multicolored lights that float away.

218.name: misdirection
218.wearOffMessage: You no longer feel like you're going every which way at once.

219.name: confusion
219.wearOffMessage: You no longer feel so confused.

222.name: pyre
222.wearOffMessage: The flames enveloping you die down.

226.name: bone cage
226.wearOffMessage: The bones holding you down crumble to dust.

244.name: blinding beauty
244.wearOffMessage: You feel a cloak of blindness dissolve.

246.name: web
246.wearOffMessage: The webs holding you in place dissolve.

248.name: protection from fire
248.wearOffMessage: You feel less protected from fire.

249.name: protection from cold
249.wearOffMessage: You feel less protected from cold.

250.name: protection from earth
250.wearOffMessage: You feel less protected from earth.

251.wearOffMessage: You feel less protected from air.
